examples: She denied that she had taken money

definitions.text: refuse to grant, as of a petition or request
examples: The dean denied the students' request for more physics courses
the prisoners were denied the right to exercise for more than 2 hours a day
he denies her her weekly allowance

definitions.text: deny oneself (something); restrain, especially from indulging in some pleasure
examples: She denied herself wine and spirits

definitions.text: deny formally (an allegation of fact by the opposing party) in a legal suit
